title: Mugen Kairaku Mesuiki Jigoku
original_name: 無限快楽メスイキ地獄
sinopse:
Hibiki and Rui were at the B.C.D. television station... But, suddenly they find themselves in a very questionable studio... Fanfiction turned reality? A new fanfiction story about Hibiki/Rui that readers have been waiting for!

(Source: Renta!)
